title: Purism Launches New Secure Librem 11 Tablet PC Powered by Linux
description:
Purism launches new secure Librem 11 tablet PC powered by Linux and the Debian-based PureOS operating system by default.

The post Purism Launches New Secure Librem 11 Tablet PC Powered by Linux appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: KDE Plasma 5.27.8 Improves Hybrid Sleep and Monitoring of NVIDIA GPUs
description:
KDE Plasma 5.27.8 is now available as the eighth maintenance update for Plasma 5.27 LTS with support for the new cross-desktop accent color standard, improved Hybrid Sleep, and more.

The post KDE Plasma 5.27.8 Improves Hybrid Sleep and Monitoring of NVIDIA GPUs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
